com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.reasoner.server

Class SnomedReasonerServerActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin
      • com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.reasoner.server.SnomedReasonerServerActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public class SnomedReasonerServerActivator
extends org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin
    Controls the server-side reasoner bundle's lifecycle.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean CONSTRAINED_HEAP
      Set to true on configurations where incremental reasoning can not be performed (maximum memory reported by the runtime is less than 3GB), false on all other systems
